attributes.action: Ban sales of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: Every year people get injured.killed and mamed sure to fireworks. Animals including pets and horses are petrified some needing sedated .
attributes.background: Sales of fireworks to general public should be banned. Every year people get injured.killed and mamed sure to fireworks. Animals including pets and horses are petrified some needing sedated .

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
